title: Enhancing Clinical Practice Competencies: Practical Online Training for Generalized Nursing Skill Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and foundational patient care knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can perform standardized nursing procedures (infection control, patient transfer, etc.) in a simulation environment with 80% accuracy within 4 weeks
Learners can analyze real clinical cases to develop nursing intervention plans and incorporate feedback from peer reviews in the LMS at least 3 times
Learners can propose at least two collaborative strategies for solving practical problems using online discussion forums and derive actionable solutions
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
